name: THE CUBE THAT WANTS PURPLE
description:
THE CUBE THAT WANTS PURPLE

The Cube, an eternally sliding red cube, desires purple. The journey to purple is a perilous one, with lots of boxy rocks waiting to crash The Cube. Will you make it to purple? Or will you die trying?

SPECIAL THANKS: Brackeys (https://www.youtube.com/c/Brackeys)

BY:  ESNAUK
